Package org.apache.taverna.server.master.interfaces

Interfaces to the main worker classes that provide the magical power that drives the webapp front-end.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Directory
    Represents a directory that is the working directory of a workflow run, or a sub-directory of it.
    DirectoryEntry
    An entry in a Directory representing a file or sub-directory.
    File
    Represents a file in the working directory of a workflow instance run, or in some sub-directory of it.
    Input
    This represents the assignment of inputs to input ports of the workflow.
    Listener
    An event listener that can be attached to a TavernaRun.
    LocalIdentityMapper
    This interface describes how to map from the identity understood by the webapp to the identity understood by the local execution system.
    MessageDispatcher
    The interface supported by all notification message dispatchers.
    Policy
    Simple policy interface.
    RunStore
    Interface to the mechanism that looks after the mapping of names to runs.
    SecurityContextFactory
    How to create instances of a security context.
    TavernaRun
    The interface to a taverna workflow run, or "run" for short.
    TavernaSecurityContext
    Security context for a workflow run.
    UriBuilderFactory
    How to manufacture URIs to workflow runs.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Directory.ZipStream
    A simple pipe that produces the zipped contents of a directory.

Package org.apache.taverna.server.master.interfaces Description

Interfaces to the main worker classes that provide the magical power that drives the webapp front-end.
